objects.specification: A flat rectangular floor panel with a subtle raised thickness and a matte light grey finish, offering a sturdy base for the booth. The surface is smooth and non-reflective, designed to withstand foot traffic and support all booth elements.

A tall rectangular wall panel three meters high and ten centimeters thick, with a smooth plaster finish in light grey. Designed to enclose the booth space while leaving a central entrance, providing a clean and modern backdrop.
A tall rectangular wall panel three meters high and ten centimeters thick, with a smooth plaster finish in light grey. Designed to enclose the booth space, providing a clean and modern backdrop.

A modern reception counter with a rectangular form, measuring two meters wide, one meter high, and sixty centimeters deep. Finished in a glossy vibrant blue with smooth rounded edges, featuring an integrated modesty panel on the front to welcome visitors.

A tall display shelf unit standing two meters high, supported by a bright red metal frame. The shelf is one and a half meters wide and thirty centimeters deep, featuring multiple evenly spaced glossy platforms for product presentation.

A tall display shelf unit standing two meters high, supported by a bright red metal frame. The shelf is one and a half meters wide and thirty centimeters deep, featuring multiple evenly spaced glossy platforms for product presentation.

A slim rectangular digital screen with a thin black bezel and a matte finish, approximately 1.2 meters wide and 0.7 meters high. The display features a vibrant high-resolution panel designed for clear content presentation.

A modern bar stool with a round cushioned seat about fifty centimeters in diameter and a seat height of seventy-five centimeters, upholstered in neutral grey fabric. Supported by slender metal legs and a circular footrest ring.

A modern bar stool with a round cushioned seat about fifty centimeters in diameter and a seat height of seventy-five centimeters, upholstered in neutral grey fabric. Supported by slender metal legs and a circular footrest ring.

A small square table with a smooth tabletop spanning one meter by one meter and a height of seventy-five centimeters, featuring a sturdy central pedestal base in a minimalist finish, ideal for product samples or discussions.

A simple wooden chair with a supportive backrest and cushioned seat, measuring approximately sixty centimeters in width and depth. Upholstered in a comfortable neutral fabric hue, with four straight legs and a softly contoured seat for extended sitting.

A hanging rectangular banner made of lightweight vibrant orange fabric, measuring two meters wide and half a meter tall. It is slightly rotated for a dynamic appearance, with reinforced edges and a subtle weave texture.

A hanging rectangular banner in vibrant orange fabric, approximately one and a half meters wide and eighty centimeters tall. The edges are hemmed and it is mounted flush above the counter for brand messaging.
A small cylindrical spotlight fixture approximately twenty centimeters in diameter, with a sleek metal housing. It emits a focused warm yellowish beam ideal for accentuating the counter area.
